personalInfo.education: University of North Florida (2013, Business Management)
personalInfo.clubAffl: New Smryrna Beach GC (New Smyrna Beach, Florida)

tourBios.carHigh: 2013: Competed on the NGA Tour, FPT and West Florida Tour, winning two events in the summer since turning pro.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Named Florida State Golf Association Junior Player of the Year in 2007...Won Florida Public Links Championship in 2007, 2008 and 2010...Was the University of North Florida Male Athlete of the Year in 2010-11...Was 2012 U.S. Public Links Championship runner-up...Was 2012 Division I honorable mention All-American.
tourBios.personal: Attended New Smryna Beach (Fla.) High School...Has one sister, Kelly...Picked golf over other sports after incurring a knee injury as a youth...Biggest thrill in golf thus far is making 40-foot birdie putt on 17th hole of 2012 U.S. Public Links Championship to win his semi-final match...Favorite course is Riviera CC...Course he would most like to play is Augusta National...Marks his golf ball with a 1963 silver half dollar...Favorite apps are Twitter and Instagram...Florida Gators was his favorite team as a kid and still is...Favorite pro teams are from New England, the Patriots, Celtics and Red Sox. Favorite athlete is Rajon Rondo...Favorite TV shows are "The Office," "Seinfeld" and "The Big Bang Theory."...Putter headcover features "Drain-O" logo...Dream foursome includes Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson and Michael Jordan...Not many people know he is allergic to milk...At the top of his bucket list is to win a major...Favorite quote is "It's not the size of the dog in the fight but the size of the fight in the dog."...Would like to be featured in GQ...Twitter name is @kevinaylwin...First-tee introduction song would be "It's Goin' Down" by Yung Doc.
